comment.body: You can find [Let's Do It](/1PGaLLNiadMzrmw6MMMnpZnskwFcdgZoS4/?!/g/1G8VWDQc5fXLkRiijJB4EZerDLmDVY75MZ/saitom-lets-do-it), [Renai Sample](/1PGaLLNiadMzrmw6MMMnpZnskwFcdgZoS4/?!/g/1G8VWDQc5fXLkRiijJB4EZerDLmDVY75MZ/renai-sample), [Kogals, Sluts, and Whatever ](/1PGaLLNiadMzrmw6MMMnpZnskwFcdgZoS4/?!/g/1G8VWDQc5fXLkRiijJB4EZerDLmDVY75MZ/gal-toka-bitch-toka-iroiro-kogals-sluts-and-whatever), [The Job of a Service Committee Member](/1PGaLLNiadMzrmw6MMMnpZnskwFcdgZoS4/?!/g/1G8VWDQc5fXLkRiijJB4EZerDLmDVY75MZ/kiyoshiro-inoue-the-job-of-a-service-committee-member), [Let Loose with Lewd Boobs](/1PGaLLNiadMzrmw6MMMnpZnskwFcdgZoS4/?!/g/1G8VWDQc5fXLkRiijJB4EZerDLmDVY75MZ/mojarin-let-loose-with-lewd-boobs) and [Melty Maiden](/1PGaLLNiadMzrmw6MMMnpZnskwFcdgZoS4/?!/g/1G8VWDQc5fXLkRiijJB4EZerDLmDVY75MZ/toroshio-melty-maiden) here on ZeroNet.

All six volumes are available on Alotaplot: [La Blue Girl Vol.1](/1PGaLLNiadMzrmw6MMMnpZnskwFcdgZoS4/?!/g/1G8VWDQc5fXLkRiijJB4EZerDLmDVY75MZ/maeda-toshio-la-blue-girl-vol1) You can find the other volumes yourselves.
There's [22 Super Taboo comics](/1PGaLLNiadMzrmw6MMMnpZnskwFcdgZoS4/?!/f/super taboo) available on [Alotaplot](/1G8VWDQc5fXLkRiijJB4EZerDLmDVY75MZ)
